Start Date Expiry Date     Salary      Posted On   Experience          Skills           Telecommute Sponsor Visa
   Immediate  30 Apr, 2025 ANG 4 Annual 31 Jan, 2025 N/A        Good communication skills No          No
   Add to Wishlist Apply

Wij zoeken een gedreven back-end developer met interesse in AI die ons energieke en innovatieve team komt versterken. Samen bouwen we aan de nieuwe generatie onderzoeksmogelijkheden voor advocaten en fiscalisten.
   Generative AI is de juridische sector snel aan het veranderen. Deze technologie biedt veel mogelijkheden om het werk van juristen en fiscalisten efficiënter en leuker te maken. Maar hoe doe je dit op een betrouwbare manier? Het afgelopen jaar heeft het AI team van Sdu GenIA-L gelanceerd. Dit is het eerste AI product in Nederland dat juridische en fiscale vraagstukken betrouwbaar kan beantwoorden. Het wordt dan ook dagelijks veelvuldig gebruikt. Twee grote doelen om GenIA-L naar een hoger niveau te tillen zijn om het systeem beter te integreren in het dagelijkse werkproces van de gebruiker en de kwaliteit van het systeem te verbeteren.
   Om dit te bereiken zoeken wij een back-end developer met interesse in AI. De komende tijd zal jij werken aan het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken, een case-builder helpen op te zetten en continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren. Daarnaast krijg je de mogelijkheid om je AI kennis te vergroten. Dat wil zeggen dat je, wanneer gewenst, zelf aan de slag kan gaan met experimenten om het product te verbeteren met machine learning modellen (zowel open-source als GPT).

We are looking for a driven back-end developer with an interest in AI to join our energetic and innovative team. Together, we are building the next generation of research capabilities for lawyers and tax specialists.
   Generative AI is rapidly changing the legal sector. This technology offers many opportunities to make the work of lawyers and tax specialists more efficient and enjoyable. But how do you do this in a reliable way? Over the past year, the AI team at Sdu launched GenIA-L. This is the first AI product in the Netherlands that can reliably answer legal and tax-related questions. As a result, it is used frequently on a daily basis. Two major goals to take GenIA-L to the next level are to better integrate the system into the user's daily workflow and to improve the quality of the system.
   To achieve this, we are looking for a back-end developer with an interest in AI. In the coming period, you will work on enabling the use of internal documents of our customers, helping to set up a case-builder, and continuously improving our codebase. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to improve your AI knowledge. This means that, if desired, you can conduct experiments to enhance the product with machine learning models (both open-source and GPT).
job_details.full_text:
Back-end Developer

Start Date Expiry Date     Salary      Posted On   Experience          Skills           Telecommute Sponsor Visa
   Immediate  30 Apr, 2025 ANG 4 Annual 31 Jan, 2025 N/A        Good communication skills No          No
   Add to Wishlist Apply

Wij zoeken een gedreven back-end developer met interesse in AI die ons energieke en innovatieve team komt versterken. Samen bouwen we aan de nieuwe generatie onderzoeksmogelijkheden voor advocaten en fiscalisten.
   Generative AI is de juridische sector snel aan het veranderen. Deze technologie biedt veel mogelijkheden om het werk van juristen en fiscalisten efficiënter en leuker te maken. Maar hoe doe je dit op een betrouwbare manier? Het afgelopen jaar heeft het AI team van Sdu GenIA-L gelanceerd. Dit is het eerste AI product in Nederland dat juridische en fiscale vraagstukken betrouwbaar kan beantwoorden. Het wordt dan ook dagelijks veelvuldig gebruikt. Twee grote doelen om GenIA-L naar een hoger niveau te tillen zijn om het systeem beter te integreren in het dagelijkse werkproces van de gebruiker en de kwaliteit van het systeem te verbeteren.
   Om dit te bereiken zoeken wij een back-end developer met interesse in AI. De komende tijd zal jij werken aan het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken, een case-builder helpen op te zetten en continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren. Daarnaast krijg je de mogelijkheid om je AI kennis te vergroten. Dat wil zeggen dat je, wanneer gewenst, zelf aan de slag kan gaan met experimenten om het product te verbeteren met machine learning modellen (zowel open-source als GPT).

We are looking for a driven back-end developer with an interest in AI to join our energetic and innovative team. Together, we are building the next generation of research capabilities for lawyers and tax specialists.
   Generative AI is rapidly changing the legal sector. This technology offers many opportunities to make the work of lawyers and tax specialists more efficient and enjoyable. But how do you do this in a reliable way? Over the past year, the AI team at Sdu launched GenIA-L. This is the first AI product in the Netherlands that can reliably answer legal and tax-related questions. As a result, it is used frequently on a daily basis. Two major goals to take GenIA-L to the next level are to better integrate the system into the user's daily workflow and to improve the quality of the system.
   To achieve this, we are looking for a back-end developer with an interest in AI. In the coming period, you will work on enabling the use of internal documents of our customers, helping to set up a case-builder, and continuously improving our codebase. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to improve your AI knowledge. This means that, if desired, you can conduct experiments to enhance the product with machine learning models (both open-source and GPT).

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and improving a Generative AI product (GenIA-L) for the legal sector. Key responsibilities include integrating internal documents, setting up a case-builder, and enhancing the codebase, all within the context of Generative AI. The role also offers opportunities to experiment with machine learning models, including open-source and GPT, and explicitly mentions improving the system's quality and integration into user workflows. This aligns strongly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working on 'continuously improving our codebase' and 'building the next generation of research capabilities', which are core software development activities.
The description mentions 'building the next generation of research capabilities for lawyers and tax specialists', indicating the development of user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: building the next generation of research capabilities

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states the opportunity to 'conduct experiments to enhance the product with machine learning models (both open-source and GPT)', which directly relates to model development and experimentation.
job_tasks.phrase: conduct experiments to enhance the product with machine learning models (both open-source and GPT)

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Generative AI is rapidly changing the legal sector' and the product 'GenIA-L' which 'reliably answer legal and tax-related questions' points to the use and development of generative models.
The goal to 'better integrate the system into the user's daily workflow and to improve the quality of the system' implies working with and refining AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: improve the quality of the system

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'enabling the use of internal documents of our customers' suggests developing features for data integration and retrieval, which is part of building software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: enabling the use of internal documents of our customers

job_tasks.justification: Helping to 'set up a case-builder' is a direct software development task to create a new feature or tool.
job_tasks.phrase: help to set up a case-builder

job_tasks.justification: The role is focused on 'research capabilities for lawyers and tax specialists' and understanding how 'Generative AI is rapidly changing the legal sector', indicating a need to grasp the business domain.
job_tasks.phrase: research capabilities for lawyers and tax specialists

job_tasks.justification: The goal to make the work of 'lawyers and tax specialists more efficient and enjoyable' shows an understanding of business needs and user impact.
job_tasks.phrase: make the work of lawyers and tax specialists more efficient and enjoyable
